GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.10.132
GSD.description:
drm/i915: fix a possible refcount leak in intel_dp_add_mst_connector()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.132 by commit 592f3bad00b7e2a95a6fb7a4f9e742c061c9c3c1, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 091a4f91942a4396c67e5747f5cb38c6396d1fc5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/i915: fix a possible refcount leak in intel_dp_add_mst_connector()
OSV.details:
